name: Mhakna Gramura and Fairy Bell
description: Written in the style of a childrenâ€™s book, Mhakna Gramura and Fairy Bell is a Cinematic Novel about two children named Mhakna and Sebiarno that escape the wretched Mullbear Orphanage with the help of a Fairy named Bell, who promises eternal happiness as long as they agree to never grow up.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 3000 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
